EmailTemplate.description: Notification email to Fund Manager of a new fund request
EmailTemplate.name: Compassion Fund - Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Compassion Fund Request {!Compassion_Fund__c.Name} Has Been Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for submitting a new request to the WEX Compassion Fund. Your request will be reviewed and you will be contacted if there are questions.
You can use the link above to access your request, provide additional information and/or read about information on the program.
Thank you, The WEX Cares Foundation
